北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 江南近海滨的一条大路上，一队清兵手执刀枪，押着七辆囚车，冲风冒寒，向北而行。
column2: Along a coastal road somewhere south of the Yangtze River, a detachment of soldiers, each of them armed with a halberd, was escorting a line of seven prison carts, trudging northwards in the teeth of a bitter wind.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 前面三辆囚车中分别监禁的是三个男子，都作书生打扮，一个是白发老者，两个是中年人。
column2: In each of the first three carts a single male prisoner was caged, identifiable by his dress as a member of the scholar class. One was a white-haired old man. The other two were men of middle years.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 后面四辆囚车中坐的是女子，最后一辆囚车中是个少妇，怀中抱着个女婴。
column2: The four rear carts were occupied by women, the last of them by a young mother holding a baby girl at her breast.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 女婴啼哭不休。 她母亲温言相呵，女婴只是大哭。
column2: The little girl was crying in a continuous wail which her mother's gentle words of comfort were powerless to console.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 囚车旁一清兵恼了，伸腿在车上踢了一脚，喝道：“再哭，再哭！
column2: One of the soldiers marching alongside, irritated by the baby's crying, aimed a mighty kick at the cart. 'Stop it! Shut up!
Or I'll really give you something to cry about!'

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 那女婴一惊，哭得更加响了。
column2: The baby, startled by this sudden violence, cried even louder.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 离开道路数十丈处有座大屋，屋檐下站着一个中年文士，一个十一二岁的小孩。
column2: Under the eaves of a large house, some hundred yards from the road, a middle-aged scholar was standing with a ten- or eleven-year-old boy at his side.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 那文士见到这等情景，不禁长叹一声，眼眶也红了，说道：“可怜，可怜！”
column2: He was evidently affected by this little scene, for a groan escaped his lips and he appeared to be very close to tears. 'Poor creatures!' he murmured to himself.

北风如刀，满地冰霜。: 那小孩问道：“爹爹，他们犯了什么罪？”
column2: 'Papa,' said the little boy, 'what have they done wrong?'
